name: Peroshkies
steps: Combine yeast, sugar and water let stand until bubbly
Add rest of ingredients and knead with flour until smooth.
Brown filling ingredients and squeeze out fat.
Roll out dough and cut into squares.
Place filling inside and pinch closed (place on cookie sheet and let rise for 10-15 min)
Brush with egg white before placing in oven.
Bake at 350 degrees for 10-15 min. or until golden brown
